general: Today, the Moon in harmony with your sign highlights your intuition and your ability to understand others. It is a favorable time to deepen your relationships and connect with your emotions.
love: Express your feelings sincerely, it will strengthen your bond.
work: Do not let stress overwhelm you. Take the time to reassess your priorities.
health: Listen to your body and allow yourself a well-deserved moment of rest.
advice: Trust your instinct, it will guide you.
teaser: Let your intuition guide you today!
